data.why:
Open-source web development library for web networks. As a library
    this provides webpage creation via simple property definitions which
    are interpreted simultaneously by the runtime and admistrative
    interfaces. Individual modules include: Hash File, Logger, Meta Data
    Management, Universal Hash Naming for Nested Data, Common Parsing,
    Data Composition via orderred and named paramater scripting,
    Calendar (date-time functions for timesheets), and a few other
    utility routines.
